analysis_age: The job posting has a positive age bias, discouraging younger candidates from applying by emphasizing the need for extensive experience and a lifelong dedication to the profession, thereby favouring older candidates.
text:
Company Background:
Chase PLC is a renowned hospitality company dedicated to providing exceptional lodging experiences to our guests. With a rich history of excellence, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive work environment.

Job Type: Lodging Manager

Job Description:
We are seeking an experienced Lodging Manager to join our team. As a seasoned professional, you will oversee the daily operations of our lodging facilities, ensuring exceptional customer service and maintaining our high standards of quality.

Responsibilities:

 Manage and supervise a team of hospitality staff
 Develop and implement operational strategies to drive business growth
 Ensure compliance with company policies and industry regulations
 Foster a positive and inclusive work environment

Qualifications and Experience:
 Minimum of 20 years of experience in the hospitality industry, with a proven track record of success in a management role
 Extensive background in lodging operations, with a focus on customer service and team leadership
 Lifelong dedication to the profession, with a passion for delivering exceptional results

Perks and Benefits:
We offer a competitive salary package, ranging from £60,000 to £80,000 per annum, based on experience and skills. Our benefits package includes comprehensive health insurance, retirement savings plan, and opportunities for professional growth and development.
